title: Bonfire of the Typo-Vanities
content: Note to all in the SF Bay Area: check here [http://typophile.com/node/14465](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804174626/http:/typophile.com/node/14465 "http://typophile.com/node/14465") for info on this Saturday's gathering. Apologies for posting a reminder in GenDisc, but stuff in the Special Interest Groups sometimes doesn't get noticed.
author: tamye
